languages.text:
Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.
Until the end of combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text:
Until the end of combat, every time a DoT deals damage to an enemy, it's final damage is increased by 100%. Stacks.
Until the end of combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Pain Fostering{/g} no longer increases DoT effect damage.

Until the end of combat, all damage dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. Multiple applications of this effect from two or more Executioners stack.
Until the end of combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of damage-over-time effects.

Until the end of combat, all damage dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. Multiple applications of this effect from two or more Executioners stack.
Until the end of combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of damage-over-time effects.

Until the end of combat, all damage dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one Executioner.
Until the end of combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of damage-over-time effects.

Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.
Until the end of combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of damage-over-time effects.

languages.text:
Hasta el final del combate, todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que infligen los efectos de daño continuado a los enemigos aumenta un +100 % después de aplicar todos los demás modificadores. Este efecto es acumulativo y puede aplicarlo más de un {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Arrepentimiento forzoso{/g} ya no aumenta el nivel de los efectos de daño continuado.
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.
Until the end of combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text:
Hasta el final del combate, todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que infligen los efectos de daño continuado a los enemigos aumenta un +100 % después de aplicar todos los demás modificadores. Este efecto es acumulativo y puede aplicarlo más de un {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Arrepentimiento forzoso{/g} ya no aumenta el nivel de los efectos de daño continuado.

languages.text:
戦闘が終了するまで、敵に継続ダメージで与えられるすべての{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が、他のすべての調整を受けた後、+100%増加する。この効果はスタックし、複数の{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}が与えることができる。
戦闘が終了するまで、{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}リペンタンスの強制{/g}でこの継続ダメージ効果のレベルが増加しなくなる。
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.
Until the end of combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘が終了するまで、敵に継続ダメージで与えられるすべての{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が、他のすべての調整を受けた後、+100%増加する。この効果はスタックし、複数の{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}が与えることができる。
戦闘が終了するまで、{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}リペンタンスの強制{/g}でこの継続ダメージ効果のレベルが増加しなくなる。

languages.text:
所有由持续伤害效果造成的伤害，当所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}系数结算完成之后，会再额外提高100%伤害，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加，且可以由多名{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}触发。
{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}强迫悔改{/g}不再会强化持续伤害效果，此效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.
Until the end of combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text:
所有由持续伤害效果造成的伤害，当所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}系数结算完成之后，会再额外提高100%伤害，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加，且可以由多名{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}触发。
{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}强迫悔改{/g}不再会强化持续伤害效果，此效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhöht sich der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aller Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte nach allen anderen Modifikatoren um +100 %. Dieser Effekt ist stapelbar und kann von mehreren {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}n angewandt werden.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhöht {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Erzwungene Reue{/g} die Stufe von Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten nicht mehr.
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.
Until the end of combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text:
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhöht sich der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aller Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte nach allen anderen Modifikatoren um +100 %. Dieser Effekt ist stapelbar und kann von mehreren {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}n angewandt werden.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhöht {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Erzwungene Reue{/g} die Stufe von Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten nicht mehr.

languages.text:
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés aux ennemis par les effets de dégâts progressifs sont augmentés de +100 % une fois tous les autres modificateurs appliqués. Cet effet est cumulable et peut être infligé par plusieurs {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteurs{/g}.
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Repentir forcé{/g} n'augmente pas davantage le niveau des effets de dégâts progressifs.
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.
Until the end of combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text:
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés aux ennemis par les effets de dégâts progressifs sont augmentés de +100 % une fois tous les autres modificateurs appliqués. Cet effet est cumulable et peut être infligé par plusieurs {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteurs{/g}.
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Repentir forcé{/g} n'augmente pas davantage le niveau des effets de dégâts progressifs.

languages.text:
До конца боя весь наносимый противникам периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 100% после применения других модификаторов. Этот эффект суммируется и может быть применен несколькими {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачами{/g}.
До конца боя {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Принудительное покаяние{/g} больше не повышает уровень эффектов периодического урона.

До конца боя весь наносимый противникам периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 100% после применения других модификаторов. Этот эффект суммируется и может быть применен несколькими {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачами{/g}.

languages.text:
Zamanla hasar veren etkiler sebebiyle düşmanlara verilen tüm {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarlar{/g}, diğer tüm değiştiriciler uygulandıktan sonra +%100 artar. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bu etki üst üste birikir ve birden fazla {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g} tarafından uygulanabilir.
{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Zoraki Tövbe{/g}, çatışma sonuna dek artık zamanla hasar veren etkilerin seviyesini artırmaz.
languages.original_text:

Until the end of combat, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of damage-over-time effects.
